synopsis.text:
The legendary heroes known as the Yatterman once clashed with the notorious Doronbow Gang, led by the captivating villainess Doronjo. Fast forward to the present day, the Yatter Kingdom, now under the protection of a new generation of Yatterman, is plagued by discontent and turmoil. The Yatterman, once hailed as saviors, have morphed into oppressive rulers, forcing their people into hard labor.

Enter Leopard, a young woman living on the outskirts of the Yatter Kingdom, blissfully unaware of her lineage tracing back to the infamous Doronbow Gang. Raised by her mother and guardians - Dorothy, Voltkatze, and Elephantus - she leads a simple life, albeit marked by poverty. However, her world turns upside down when she stumbles upon a hidden mural depicting Doronjo, Boyacky, and Tonzura.

Discovering her ancestors' ties to the villainous gang, Leopard initially vows to distance herself from their legacy. However, as the oppression of the Yatterman intensifies, Leopard finds herself drawn to her ancestral roots. Embracing her heritage, she assumes the mantle of Doronjo, reassembling the Doronbow Gang to challenge the tyranny of the Yatterman and restore justice to the Yatter Kingdom.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
